name: Consorzio Remedia
memberOrga: 1.600 producers of EEE and batteries. Amongst this (to cite just few) Samsung, Apple, Dell, Fastweb, Vodafone, Panasonic, Philips, Rolex
goal: Remedia is one of the major European WEEE and Batteries  PRO (Producers Responsibility Organization): it is a non for profit institution in charge of managing the end of life of electrical and electronic equipments (W-EEE) and batteries derived by the products put on the market by its associates that are more than 1500.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Environment, International co-operation and development
